Posts.Content: Feb 16, 2008 03:07PM DrG wrote: Ativan is an anti-anxiety medication that can be addictive if taken too frequently and it has saved my emotional life. I take it every so often when the fear kicks in. I'm a recently dx'd DCIS (I hope) pt and am waiting for surgery. The waiting is the worst part, whether it is for surgery or for that biopsy. BTW, I have had many ultrasound biopsies in the past that were negative, and they're not painful. Hope this helps.
Posts.Title: does anyone take atavan or is it ativan? jinky Lynn12
